Detailed Description

Definition at line 22 of file CFont.h.

Member Function Documentation

void CFont::setMonochrome ( bool  value  ) 

This function defines, that we have a monochrome fontmap Vorticon engine uses a 8x8 tilemap for printing the fonts. As it has other characters, it can never be monochrome The Galaxy engine uses monochrome because it derives the other colours by tricking around with palette in our case...

Parameters:
value set true if the fontmap is monochrome, else false

Definition at line 105 of file CFont.cpp.

Uint32 CFont::getBGColour ( bool  highlighted  ) 

Retrieves the background colour of the font map.

Parameters:
highlighted The fontmap has two background colours. One is highlighted (default gray) The other is not (default white) Those colours normally differ in mods.
